Brix/Gekkidama

Brix put his hand on Ramulus' shoulder.

"Alright, Ramulus. You're a good friend."

"Oooh.....How touching," said Gekkidama, "A fallen Prime and and an 
innocent bystander make last words to each other, just before dying. 
Come on! I've been waiting for this for a long time, Brix. Let's do 
it."

Brix gives a warning to Ramulus

"Listen, I don't know if you know this, but when I get angry my split 
personality, Bronco, comes out and takes control. I've been 
meditating recently, but this guy is making me really angry, and I 
don't know if I can control it. If it does come out, and you'l see it 
in the way I act, you have to get out. Because I'll kill you, too. 
Alright, ready?"
______________________________________________________________________
Zava

Zava heard the computer voice overhead, saying the engines will be 
dumped in 3 minutes Zava laughed to herself.


Hehehehe! No good Predacons. Th engines go up in 1:00 minute, and 
that's when you all die!!!!!"
